title: How to Make a Photo Look Like iPod Ads

steps.headline: If you took your photo using a digital camera, simply connect it to the computer and download the photo of your choice to your destination folder.
If your photograph is on a non-digital camera, you will need to get it developed and then scanned into your computer using a scanner.
Open your photo in the program.
Use the select tool to carefully select the body and clothes of the person.
steps.description: Remember you must not select anything in their hands.

steps.headline: Use the Paint Bucket/Brush tool to colour the selection black.
Use the select tools to select anything the person has in his or her hands.
Select the entire person, including hands and anything they hold using the Lasso/Select tools.
Choose a light colour and fill the background with it.
Select the paintbrush tool and paint the small uncoloured areas.
If you want you can add some text with the colour white selected.
steps.description: The best font to use is Myriad Pro. Apple uses a custom font, but it is extremely similar to Myriad.
